TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表網頁內的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Represents an HTML element inside of a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 HTML 文件中的項目之任何可能的類型，例如`BODY`， `TABLE`，和`FORM`，和其他項目。 represents any possible type of element in an HTML document, such as `BODY`, `TABLE`, and `FORM`, among others. 這個類別會公開最常見的屬性，您可以預期所有項目上找不到。The class exposes the most common properties you can expect to find on all elements. 大部分的項目可以有*子項目*： 位於其下方的其他 HTML 項目。Most elements can have *child elements*: other HTML elements that are placed underneath them. 使用屬性來測試是否為指定項目具有子系，而来逐一查看這些集合。Use the property to test whether a given element has children, and the collection to iterate through them. 屬性會傳回中目前的項目巢狀。The property returns the in which the current element is nested. 您通常需要存取的屬性、 屬性和方法不會直接公開所對應的項目上，例如`SRC`屬性`IMG`項目或`Submit`方法`FORM`。You often need access to attributes, properties, and methods on the underlying element that are not directly exposed by , such as the `SRC` attribute on an `IMG` element or the `Submit` method on a `FORM`. 和方法可讓您擷取及修改任何屬性或屬性上的特定項目，雖然提供存取任何未公開在受管理文件物件模型 (DOM) 的方法。The and methods enable you to retrieve and alter any attribute or property on a specific element, while provides access to any methods not exposed in the managed Document Object Model (DOM). 如果您的應用程式具有 unmanaged 程式碼權限，您也可以存取未公開的屬性和方法的屬性。If your application has unmanaged code permission, you can also access unexposed properties and methods with the attribute. 使用来測試的項目是否屬於特定型別的屬性。Use the property to test whether an element is of a specific type. 在執行階段可以修改任何 HTML 文件。Any HTML document can be modified at run time. 您可以建立新物件與方法，並將其新增到另一個項目使用或方法。You can create new objects with the method of , and add them to another element using the or methods. 您也可以建立為 HTML 標記的項目，並將它們指派給現有項目屬性。You can also create the elements as HTML tags and assign them to an existing element's property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何檢查任意的 HTML 文件，並衍生描述 HTML 元素，包含縮排的字串，以及用來指示如何深度的層級編號巢狀項目文件中。The following code example shows how to examine an arbitrary HTML document and derive a string describing the HTML elements, with indentation and level numbers used to indicate how deeply nested the elements are in the document. 這個程式碼範例需要您的應用程式主機控制項，名為`WebBrowser1`。This code example requires that your application hosts a control named `WebBrowser1`. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: If the current element is a TABLE, for example, will return every TH, TR, and TD element within the table, as well as any other elements, such as DIV and SPAN elements, contained within the cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要存取僅將目前的項目，當做其直接父這些項目，請使用集合改為。To access only those elements which have the current element as their direct parent, use the collection instead. 在此集合中的項目不一定會傳回來源順序。Elements in this collection will not necessarily be returned in source order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 可讓您修改 HTML 中的檔案數種方式的執行階段內容。The HTML Document Object Model (DOM) enables you to alter the run-time contents of an HTML file in a number of ways. 使用現有文件，加入新項目或移動項目頁面上。Use to add new elements to an existing document, or to move an element on the page. 如果父代的項目，將項目附加至另一個項目會自動移除該元素從先前父代。If an element has already been parented, appending an element to another element will automatically remove that element from its previous parent. 在執行階段使用的文件進行任何新增項目並不會保存在呼叫時方法控制項。Any additions made to a document at run-time using will not be persisted when you call the method on the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新的超連結使用方法並將它加入結尾的頁面上，使用`AppendChild`上`BODY`項目。The following code example creates a new hyperlink using the method and adds it to end of a page using `AppendChild` on the `BODY` element. 這個範例需要您的應用程式包含控制項，名為`WebBrowser1`。The example requires that your application contains a control named `WebBrowser1`. span.span: Adds an event handler for a named event on the HTML Document Object Model (DOM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 管理文件物件模型 (DOM) 會公開只有選取的事件數目。The Managed Document Object Model (DOM) exposes only a select number of events. 針對特定類型的項目; 只定義的大多數未公開的事件例如`submit`事件，這是只有在有效`FORM`項目。Most of the unexposed events are only defined for specific types of elements; such as the `submit` event, which is valid only on `FORM` elements. 使用這些未公開的事件加入事件處理常式。Use to add an event handler to these unexposed events. 您不應該附加至文件或其物件事件，直到文件已完成載入。You should not attach an event to the document or one of its objects until the document has completed loading. 您應該呼叫這個方法最舊的處於事件控制項。The earliest you should call this method is in the event of the control. 如需可用的 unmanaged 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[存取 Managed HTML 文件物件模型上的未公開成員](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md)與樣式有關介面：[樣式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104876)， [IHTMLElement2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104877)， [IHTMLElement3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104878)， [IHTMLElement4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104879)。For more information about the available unmanaged events, see [Accessing Unexposed Members on the Managed HTML Document Object Model](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md) and the IHTMLElement interfaces: [IHTMLElement](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104876), [IHTMLElement2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104877), [IHTMLElement3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104878), [IHTMLElement4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104879).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些項目，例如`IMG`和`SCRIPT`，不能有任何子系。Some elements, such as `IMG` and `SCRIPT`, cannot have any children. 使用這個屬性，才能呼叫或任意項目上。Use this property before you call or on an arbitrary element. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理事件。The following code example handles the event on . 如果項目不是先前使用滑鼠點按選取，程式碼會將項目指派給名為私用類別變數`MoveElement`。If an element was not previous selected using a mouse click, the code assigns the element to a private class variable named `MoveElement`. 如果選取項目，則程式碼會嘗試將它附加至剛剛所選取的項目。If an element was selected, the code attempts to append it to the element that was just clicked. 這個程式碼範例需要您的應用程式主機控制項，名為`WebBrowser1`，和您已經加入的事件處理常式事件。This code example requires that your application hosts a control named `WebBrowser1`, and that you have already added an event handler for the event on . remarks.format: ## Remarks 許多 HTML 檔案內的項目可以有其下方的其他 HTML 項目。Many of the elements inside of an HTML file can have other HTML elements underneath them. 集合提供簡單的機制，用來瀏覽文件的樹狀結構。The collection provides a simple mechanism for exploring the tree structure of a document. 只會公開其直接父代為目前的項目項目。 only exposes elements whose direct parent is the current element. 如果您有如`TABLE`項目，可讓您的所有`TR`（資料列） 內的項目`TABLE`。If you have an for a `TABLE` element, will give you all of the `TR` (row) elements inside of the `TABLE`. 擷取`TD`（儲存格） 內所包含的項目`TR`項目，您必須使用上每個個別的收集`TR`項目或使用集合。To retrieve the `TD` (cell) elements contained inside of the `TR` elements, you will need to use either the collection on each individual `TR` element, or use the collection on . 來源順序不保證此集合中的項目。Elements in this collection are not guaranteed to be in source order. 如果是`false`，`Children`永遠為空白。If is `false`, `Children` will always be empty. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查任意的 HTML 文件，並衍生可描述項目，包含縮排字串以及用來指示如何深度的層級編號巢狀項目文件中。The following code example examines an arbitrary HTML document and derive a string describing the elements, with indentation and level numbers used to indicate how deeply nested the elements are in the document. 其做法是搜尋`Children`集合的所有項目以遞迴方式在文件的最上方的 HTML 元素開始。It does this by searching the `Children` collection of all elements recursively, starting with the HTML element at the top of the document. 這個程式碼範例會要求您的應用程式具有控制項，名為`WebBrowser1`。This code example requires that your application has a control named `WebBrowser1`. summary.span: 發生於使用者使用滑鼠左鍵按一下此項目時。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks on the element with the left mouse button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以取消的預設動作藉由設定項目上的事件屬性類別`true`。You can cancel the default action for a event on an element by setting the property of the class to `true`. A項目上的事件也會發生在該元素的父項目，然後在類別本身，除非您設定屬性類別`true`。A event on an element will also occur on that element's parent elements and on the class itself, unless you set the property of the class to `true`. 如果使用者不會不目前具有輸入焦點的項目上按一下之後就會發生的事件事件前,該元素的事件。If the user clicks on an element that does not currently have input focus, the event will occur after the event, but before the event for that element. 如需取消事件反昇和取消事件的預設動作之間的差異的詳細資訊，請參閱[關於 DHTML 物件模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx)。For more information about the difference between canceling event bubbling and canceling the default action on an event, see [About the DHTML Object Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`HtmlElement1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlElement1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#432](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#432)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#432](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#432)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 會傳回位置資料，只對項目已指派明確的高度和寬度或使用絕對位置的項目。 will return position data only for elements that have been assigned an explicit height and width, or elements that use absolute positioning. 文件絕對定位的位置樣式設定為如果`absolute`之後的它可以位於任何座標上的 HTML 網頁。A document is absolutely positioned if its position style is set to `absolute`, after which it can be positioned at any coordinate on the HTML page. ## Examples 假設您已載入下列 HTML 網頁至託管的執行個體控制項。Assume you have loaded the following HTML page into a hosted instance of the control. ```
Edit this text.
``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何擷取此項目，並擴充其維度，如果用戶端區域不超過 400 像素寬 x 50 像素高，而且也會設定`DIV`至`contentEditable`狀態，讓使用者可以輸入文字。The following code example demonstrates retrieving this element and expanding its dimensions if the client area is less than 400 pixels wide by 50 pixels high, and also sets the `DIV` to the `contentEditable` state so that the user can input text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 HTML 頁面可以裝載框架使用`FRAMESET`標記。Some HTML pages can host frames using the `FRAMESET` tags. 在此情況下，每個個別`FRAME`元素會包含自己的執行個體。In this case, each individual `FRAME` element will contain its own instance of . 當您從事件處理常式中收到的項目參考，這個屬性便最有用，而且需要執行一些動作項目所在的文件。This property is most useful when you have received a reference to an element in an event handler from the , and need to perform some action on the document in which the element resides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是包裝函式的 Internet Explorer 文件物件模型 (DOM)，以撰寫使用元件物件模型 (COM)。 is a wrapper for the Internet Explorer Document Object Model (DOM), which is written using the Component Object Model (COM). 如果您需要存取未公開的屬性或方法的基礎 COM 介面，例如`IHTMLElement`，您可以使用此物件來查詢它們。If you need to access unexposed properties or methods on the underlying COM interfaces, such as `IHTMLElement`, you can use this object to query for them. 若要使用的 unmanaged 的介面，您必須將 MSHTML 程式庫 (mshtml.dll) 匯入您的應用程式。In order to use the unmanaged interfaces, you will need to import the MSHTML library (mshtml.dll) into your application. 不過，您也可以執行未公開的屬性和方法使用`Invoke`方法。However, you can also execute unexposed properties and methods using the `Invoke` method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用目前所選取的文字並將它轉換成超連結，使用者選擇的 url 未受管理的介面。The following code example uses unmanaged interfaces to take the currently selected text and convert it into a hyperlink, with the URL chosen by the user. 此程式碼假設您的表單具有寫入控制項，名為`WebBrowser1`，且您已經為您的專案參考加入將 unmanaged 的 MSHTML 程式庫。This code was written under the assumption that your form has a control named `WebBrowser1`, and that you have added the unmanaged MSHTML library as a reference to your project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 按兩下是由使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定決定。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 使用者可以設定滑鼠按鍵的按一下之間應間隔多少時間才視為按兩下，而不是兩次按一下。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks. 您可以取消的預設動作藉由設定項目上的事件屬性類別`true`。You can cancel the default action for a event on an element by setting the property of the class to `true`. A項目上的事件也會發生在該元素的父項目，然後在類別本身，除非您設定屬性類別`true`。A event on an element will also occur on that element's parent elements and on the class itself, unless you set the property of the class to `true`. 如需取消事件反昇和取消事件的預設動作之間的差異的詳細資訊，請參閱[關於 DHTML 物件模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx)。For more information about the difference between canceling event bubbling and canceling the default action on an event, see [About the DHTML Object Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`HtmlElement1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlElement1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有幾種方式可以將新項目新增至現有的 HTML 頁面上，例如和方法。There are several ways to add new elements to an existing HTML page, such as the and methods. 使用通常是最快的方法，您必須在您的新項目上設定多屬性或樣式時，將新的內容。Using is often the fastest way to add new content when you have to set many attributes or styles on your new elements. 不同於在於將不會包含代表您要呼叫的物件的 HTML。 differs from in that will not include the HTML that represents the object you are calling. 請參閱如需有關這兩個屬性之間的差異。See for more information about the difference between these two properties. 設定終結先前附加至項目的任何子系。Setting destroys any children previously appended to the element. 如果您從 DOM 中擷取的項目，然後將新的 HTML 指派給其父代屬性，您可將項目的參考會變成無法，和其屬性和方法呼叫時，其行為未定義。If you retrieve an element from the DOM and then assign new HTML to its parents' property, your reference to that element will be useless, and its behavior when it calls its properties and methods is undefined. 對於某些項目，設定不是有效的作業。For some elements, setting is not a valid operation. 某些 HTML 標記中有沒有結結尾標記，例如`IMG`標記，並因此不能包含巢狀項目。Some HTML tags have no closing tag, such as the `IMG` tag, and therefore cannot contain nested elements. 某些標記，例如`SCRIPT`標記中，僅可包含文字內容; 設定會導致錯誤。Some tags, such as the `SCRIPT` tag, can only contain text content; setting will result in an error. 這兩種類型的標記屬性會傳回`false`。For both types of tags, the property will return `false`. 不過，您也無法設定上`TABLE`和`TR`項目，做為將指派給這些元素的格式不正確的 HTML 可能會損毀文件的呈現。However, you also cannot set on `TABLE` and `TR` elements, as assigning malformed HTML to these elements could corrupt the rendering of the document. 使用或`insertRow`和`insertCell`上未受管理的方法`IHTMLTable`介面来加入的資料列和儲存格`TABLE`。Use or the `insertRow` and `insertCell` methods on the unmanaged `IHTMLTable` interface to add rows and cells to a `TABLE`. 如果您只需要將文字指派給項目和沒有 HTML 標記，使用屬性改為。If you need only to assign text to an element and not HTML markup, use the property instead. 指派值給會破壞先前指派 使用任何文字值。Assigning a value to will destroy any text values previously assigned using .

A項目上的事件也會發生在該元素的父項目，然後在類別本身，除非您設定屬性類別`true`。A event on an element will also occur on that element's parent elements and on the class itself, unless you set the property of the class to `true`. 如需取消事件反昇和取消事件的預設動作之間的差異的詳細資訊，請參閱[關於 DHTML 物件模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx)。For more information about the difference between canceling event bubbling and canceling the default action on an event, see [About the DHTML Object Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`HtmlElement1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlElement1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. ## Remarks 可以在其中一種方式在 HTML 網頁上放置項目： 預設流動位置;相對定位在項目位移的固定數量相對於其父代。和絕對定位中的項目提供固定協調文件的左上角相對的位置。Elements can be positioned on an HTML page in one of three ways: default flow positioning; relative positioning, in which the element is offset by a fixed amount relative to its parent; and absolute positioning, in which the element is given a fixed coordinate position relative to the upper-left corner of the document. 當文件的項目使用相對或絕對位置時，您可以使用`OffsetParent`計算項目的工作區中的座標位置。When a document's elements use relative or absolute positioning, you can use `OffsetParent` to calculate an element's coordinate position in the client area. 如需有關項目定位在 HTML 中，請參閱[相關項目定位](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533005.aspx)。For more information about element positioning in HTML, see [About Element Positioning](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533005.aspx). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何和不同`span1`，`span2`和`span3`:The following code example shows how and differ for `span1`, `span2` and `span3`: ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓項目內容的探索。The property enables discovery of an element's context. 它是最有用的事件處理常式內例如，它可以引發的任何文件的物件階層架構中的任何位置的項目。It is most useful inside of event handlers such as , which can fire for any element anywhere in the document's object hierarchy. 屬性的 HTML 項目 （HTML 文件頂端） 指回。The property of the HTML element (the top of an HTML document) points back to itself. 如果您呼叫在迴圈中，確認 迴圈的中斷條件比較目前的項目類型和類型`Parent`或是您的程式碼的屬性，可能會執行一個無限迴圈。If you call inside a loop, verify that the loop's break condition compares the type of the current element and the type of the `Parent` property, or else your code may execute an infinite loop. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會尋找所有`IMG`文件標記，並使用屬性來測試是否`IMG`是超連結至其他頁面; 如果是，程式碼指派的 URL`ALT`屬性`IMG`標記，以便使用者可以將滑鼠移以查看將它需要的映像。The following code example finds all of the `IMG` tags in a document, and uses the property to test whether the `IMG` is hyperlinked to another page; if it is, the code assigns the URL to the `ALT` attribute of the `IMG` tag, so that users can mouse over the image to see where it will take them. remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 中的屬性是任何有效的名稱 / 值組，該元素。An attribute in HTML is any valid name-value pair for that element. 公開 （expose) 只會留下任何這些僅適用於特定類型的項目; 的所有項目的通用的屬性`SRC`是預先定義的屬性`IMG`標記，例如，但不適用於`DIV`標記。 exposes only those attributes that are common to all elements, leaving out those that only apply to certain types of elements; `SRC` is a predefined attribute for the `IMG` tag, for example, but not for the `DIV` tag. 使用和操作不會公開在受管理文件物件模型 (DOM) 的屬性。Use and to manipulate attributes not exposed on the managed Document Object Model (DOM). 如果`attributeName`不是在某個元素定義的屬性會定義做為新屬性項目上。If `attributeName` is not a defined attribute on an element, will define it on the element as a new attribute. 和不區分大小寫。 and are case-insensitive. 若要設定`class`屬性，您必須參考屬性做為`className`時指定的第一個引數 To set the `class` attribute on an , you must refer to the attribute as `className` when specifying the first argument to ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將新`IMG`元素要與目前文件，使用設定`SRC`映像的屬性。The following code example adds a new `IMG` element to the current document, using to set the `SRC` attribute for the image. summary.span: 為目前項目取得或設定以分號分隔的樣式清單。

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 會使用樣式全球資訊網協會階層式樣式表規格中所定義來控制顯示的項目。The HTML Document Object Model (DOM) uses styles as defined in the World Wide Web Consortiums Cascading Style Sheets specification to control the display of an element. 在 樣式屬性形式的分號分隔名稱 / 值組，與每個成對分號分隔的如下所示：Styles in the property take the form of colon-delimited name-value pairs, with each pair separated by a semicolon, as follows: `style-name1:value1;...;[style-nameN:valueN;]` 若要設定的字型`DIV`要 14 點 Times New Roman 粗體的項目，例如，您會指派下列字串：To set the font for a `DIV` element to 14-point Times New Roman bold, for example, you would assign the following string: `font-face:Times New Roman;font-size:14px;font-weight:bold;` 完整的 HTML DOM 中的所有可用樣式清單，請參閱[樣式屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms534651.aspx)。For a full list of all available styles in the HTML DOM, see [STYLE Attribute](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms534651.aspx).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 決定當使用者按下 TAB 鍵，HTML 文件中的哪個項目接下來會接收焦點。 determines which element in an HTML document will next receive focus when the user presses the TAB key. 根據預設，會在定位順序中所包含的唯一元素`INPUT`項目，`SELECT`控制項，以及任何項目其`contentEditable`屬性設定為`true`。By default, the only elements included in the tab order are `INPUT` elements, the `SELECT` control, and any element whose `contentEditable` property is set to `true`. 您可以包含任何 HTML 項目定位順序，例如`DIV`，藉由指派明確。You can include any HTML element in the tab order, such as a `DIV`, by assigning it an explicit . 有效值的-32767 到 32767 之間的範圍內。Valid values for range from -32767 to 32767.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 文件物件模型中的許多項目有屬性、 屬性和對這些項目，都是唯一的方法例如`HREF`屬性`A`項目，或`Submit`方法`FORM`。Many elements in the HTML Document Object Model have attributes, properties, and methods that are unique to those elements; such as the `HREF` attribute on the `A` element, or the `Submit` method on `FORM`. 使用當您有可能任意類型的項目，並需要執行的特定類型的作業。Use when you have an element of a potentially arbitrary type, and need to perform a type-specific operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會尋找所有`IMG`文件標記，並使用`TagName`屬性來測試是否`IMG`是超連結至其他頁面; 如果是，程式碼指派的 URL`ALT`屬性`IMG`標記，以便使用者可以將滑鼠移以查看將它需要的映像。The following code example finds all of the `IMG` tags in a document, and uses the `TagName` property to test whether the `IMG` is hyperlinked to another page; if it is, the code assigns the URL to the `ALT` attribute of the `IMG` tag, so that users can mouse over the image to see where it will take them.
